setup_script_description: sets focus on the 'Style/Color' menu item
task: navigate to checked menuitemcheckbox in submenu
specific_user_instruction:
Open "Style/Color" menu using the down arrow key. | 
Navigate to 'Italic' menu item and check it by pressing enter. (the menu will close.) | 
Re-open "Style/Color" menu using the down arrow key. | 
Navigate to 'Italic' menu item
output_assertions: The role 'menu item checkbox' is conveyed
The position of the item and number of items in the menu is conveyed
The name and role of the 'Font Style' group are conveyed
